mapper.insert: insert into cs_board (no, category, title, writer, content, file_ref, tel) values(customer_cs_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content} , #{fileRef}, #{tel})
mapper.select: select no, status, category, title, writer, reg_date as regDate, tel, content, answer from cs_board where writer = #{id} order by status, regDate desc
select no, status, category, title, writer, reg_date as regDate, tel, content, answer from cs_board order by status, regDate desc
